name: The Warrior's Path
description:
The Warrior’s Path is a singleplayer RPG, focused on your decisions in many different events.
It's about how many events you can survive and what story you experience in the process.
Each journey will be different.

You play as a deserter who is tired of fighting other people's wars. In a gloomy forest within the war zone, you'll set out on your path and encounter various events that require difficult choices, that can have longterm effects on other events.



Whether you meet a friend or foe may sometimes be obvious, but often less so.

You definitely want to be prepared for any eventuality.
So a big part of your journey will involve finding and crafting the best possible equipment and consumable items.

Enjoy a runescape-like combat system. Use Abilities and usable items to your advantage.


What will be your story? How long can you survive on the road?
